titleStmt.title: The castell of courtesie whereunto is adioyned the holde of humilitie: with the chariot of chastitie thereunto annexed. Also a dialogue betwéene age and youth, and other matters herein conteined. By Iames Yates seruingman. 1582.
titleStmt.author: Yates, James, servingman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, dwelling in Distaffe Lane, neere vnto the signe of the Castle,

notesStmt.note: "The hould of humilitie" has separate title page, foliation, and register. "The chariot of chastitie" has separate dated title page; foliation and register are continuous.
This state of quire ² A outer forme has sub title page to "The hould of humilitie" with "seruingman" in line 5.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
